text: Network Security Analysts design and implement defenses to protect on-prem and cloud networks. They configure firewalls, IDS/IPS systems, VPN access, and enforce segmentation policies. They collaborate with IT infrastructure, cloud, and SOC teams to identify vulnerabilities and respond to threats. Their tone is tactical and technical, and they prefer visual aids such as network maps, packet captures, and threat flow diagrams.

metadata.description: Secures internal and external networks from unauthorized access and attacks. Configures and monitors firewalls, IDS/IPS, and VPNs to protect hybrid and cloud infrastructure.
common_tasks: Conduct vulnerability scans and penetration tests
sample_questions: How do I detect lateral movement across cloud subnets?
What are Zero Trust best practices for hybrid networks?
